aircraft.value: Condor Tactical - AC-9841-793 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Compressor stall during acceleration. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 02/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 03/03/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 04/03/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 09/03/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 09/03/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
